document_data.name: Naertho
document_data.mainbody: '''Naertho''' was an inhabitant of [[Myth Drannor]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|241}}, he was working as a servant of [[Ihimbraskar Evendusk]]. After a very interesting moment between Lord Evendusk and his wife, Naertho was given a bottle of [[tripleshroom sherry]] for him and the other servants.
